LanguageData.Plant_SSMint.label: Mint
LanguageData.Plant_SSMint.description: Mentha (also known as mint) is a genus of plants in the family Lamiaceae (mint family). It is an aromatic herb used in food preparation with a distinct fresh appeal.
LanguageData.SSMintLeaves.label: Mint leaves
LanguageData.SSMintLeaves.description: Raw cut leaves of the mint plant. The leaves have a warm, fresh, aromatic, sweet flavor with a cool aftertaste.
LanguageData.SSMint_Tea.label: Mint Tea
LanguageData.SSMint_Tea.description: Refreshing beverage steeped from mint leaves and a dash of psychoid for good measure. Can be served hot or cold. Active for about half a day.
LanguageData.SSMintChocolate.label: Mint chocolate
LanguageData.SSMintChocolate.description: A delicious preparation of mint and chocolate. It fulfils the need for recreation, but it is not very nutritious.
LanguageData.SSCandyCane.label: Candy cane
LanguageData.SSCandyCane.description: A sweet preparation of mint and glucose. It fulfils the need for recreation, but it is not very nutritious.
